title: Which are the free guest post sites? - Quora

response.answer_text: Link building is the surefire way to boost your search traffic. After link building, building relationships with other bloggers in your niche also plays a key role in your blogging success. What if you can do both that is build links and relationships using only one tactic? Here’s where guest posting comes into play. You can build relevant links and relationships with other bloggers. Use guest posting to network with others (not just for the sake of links). That’s when you’ll succeed! Here are some of the benefits of guest blogging. Drive targeted traffic to your sites (if you’re guest blogging on relevant sites in your industry)Generate high quality leads and sales (make sure to link to specific landing pages)Improves your online expertiseIncreases your brand awarenessHelps you generate quality links (which is the reason why 90% of the people write guest posts btw)Helps you connect with other bloggersSo let’s now talk about some of the proven ways to find free guest posting sites. Use guest blogging platforms There are some platforms that you can use to find guest posting opportunities. Here are some of them; MyBlogGuestGuestBlogItBloggerLinkUpBlogSynergyGuest Blog GeniusGuestrUse “free resources” There are a ton of bloggers who write and compile lists of free blogging sites.  As a matter of fact, we’ve a HUGE list of over 250 free guest blogging sites where you can find all kinds of blogs ranging from technology to news to entertainment. So make sure to check it out to find free sites to write guest posts. Use Google This is the simplest way. Use Google by trying out the following search terms and you’ll find unlimited number of guest posting opportunities. “blogs that accept guest bloggers”“blogs that accept guest posts”“contribute to our site”“become a guest blogger”“become a guest writer”“become an author”“bloggers wanted”“blogs accepting guest posts”Try to include a + sign and use your niche to find relevant guest posting opportunities. For instance, if you’re looking for technology sites that accept guest posts, you can use the following search strings. “become a guest blogger + technology”“become a guest writer + technology”“become an author + technology”“bloggers wanted + technology”Here are some quick tips to start your guest blogging journey the right way. Use metrics such as DA (domain authority) to evaluate the authority of a domain. When you’re starting out, try to prefer sites with at least 30+ DA (getting links from high DA sites can increase your site’s domain authority as well)Know your goals before writing a guest post. What do you want out of guest posts? Do you need more traffic? Sales? Email signups? Or just links? Based on your goals, you can pick selective blogs (authority sites if you want more traffic or sales), new blogs if you’re just looking for links.Finally, measure your guest blogging results. Do less of what doesn't work and more of what does. Rinse and repeat!Have any questions? Let me know in the comments and please upvote if you find this answer useful. To your success, Anil Agarwal

You cannot generate enough organic traffic to your website just by posting content on your blog alone. So, there’s no doubt that guest posting is one of the most powerful ways to drive traffic to your site. It will help you reach new audiences and improve your search engine rankings. Guest posting will also help you to gain more exposure and build long-lasting relationships with other websites. Additionally, it will help you establish the credibility and authority of your brand. Before I give you a list of free guest post sites, let’s talk about the importance of guest posting. I will also talk about how can you start guest posting and how you can find a high DA guest post website. Did you know, when compared to other websites, Google gives high rankings to websites which have high-quality backlinks? This indicates that backlinks are a significant factor in the Google algorithm, which governs the exposure and authority of your website. If you are a blogger and struggling to generate more organic traffic to your website, then you should try guest posting. The more high-quality backlinks you have, the more organic traffic you can drive to your website. Now, let’s take a look at how you can start guest blogging. Before you begin hunting for guest post opportunities, ensure that you create valuable and unique content which is more than 1000 words. Also, make sure that you create content which is relevant to the niche of the guest post website. Let’s say the website only accepts content from the fashion niche; then you cannot create content related to fitness or any other topic other than fashion. Once you create your content, you need to search for high domain authority guest website from your niche to post your content. Not all websites have the same domain authority (DA). So, you should select the ones with the highest DA as that will help you secure top rank on the search engines. Now, let’s see how you can find the best guest posting website for your niche. You can do a quick Google search and quickly browse the results to find a blog post which lists top guest posting websites from all niches. Often these lists are organized by high to low domain authority and by topics. However, you cannot blindly rely on these lists. So, you may have to visit each website to check out the domain authority by yourself. Additionally, you need to find out if they still accept guest posts. This quick exercise will surely help you effectively and easily find guest blog website from your niche.
